author: GlaucusResearch
content: Glaucus issues Comprehensive Rebuttal to Fullshare’s (HK: 607) Clarification Announcement. Full Rebuttal at  https://t.co/ktIznTlVfZ

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Fullshare fails to give any meaningful rebuttal to data indicating that its stock is manipulated in the final hour of trading

author: GlaucusResearch
content: In FY 2016, Fullshare generated only RMB 132 mm in EBIT from con’t ops, meaning it trades at over 400 times recurring operating profits

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Despite a 264x increase in market cap since 2013, Fullshare’s cash flows from its recurring ops has increased only 28%

author: GlaucusResearch
content: If an investor bought and held Fullshare’s stock from Dec 5, 2016, through April 24, 2017, it would have generated a loss of -20%

author: GlaucusResearch
content: But if an investor only invested in the last hour of each day during that period, compounded returns would have been a staggering 59%!
